description: The Unwind Bedside Alarm Dock is a full-function dual alarm clock with gradual wake that also charges and plays iPhone, iPod, and iPad devices. The auto-set clock has six nature sounds - Waterfall, Brook, Rain, Forest, Ocean, and Summer Night. A passive subwoofer provides expanded bass profile and excellent sound. The digital tune FM radio has 10 station presets, and a USB port for charging your devices. Plus, it has an aux-in for connecting non-Apple devices. The Unwind features a customizable color-changing mood light and includes a convenient remote control.
title: HMDX Audio HX-B322 Unwind Bedside Alarm Dock
